content:
[
  {
    "scene_id": "SCN-ARC-001-001",
    "arc_id": "ARC-001",
    "objective": "Establish the protagonist's arrival in the white room and initial confrontation with the two doors",
    "conflict": "The protagonist must choose between two mysterious doors without knowing what lies beyond either",
    "conflict_type": "internal",
    "emotion_target": "anticipation",
    "emotion_intensity": 0.3,
    "seeds_planted": [],
    "seeds_bloomed": [],
    "subtext": {
      "character_thinks": "I need to make the right choice",
      "reader_knows": "The choice will have significant consequences",
      "tension_type": "decision paralysis",
      "implied_emotion": "anxiety"
    },
    "sensory_anchor": "The cold metal of the door handles against my palms",
    "constraints": [],
    "beats": [],
    "target_word_count": 400,
    "justification": "This scene establishes the central premise and begins the emotional journey from anticipation toward the climactic decision"
  },
  {
    "scene_id": "SCN-ARC-001-002",
    "arc_id": "ARC-001",
    "objective": "Deepen the protagonist's internal struggle as she weighs the implications of her choice",
    "conflict": "Growing pressure to decide while memories and fears cloud her judgment",
    "conflict_type": "internal",
    "emotion_target": "sadness",
    "emotion_intensity": 0.6,
    "seeds_planted": [],
    "seeds_bloomed": [],
    "subtext": {
      "character_thinks": "Every choice I've made has led to loss",
      "reader_knows": "Her past decisions haunt her present moment",
      "tension_type": "regret and fear",
      "implied_emotion": "melancholy"
    },
    "sensory_anchor": "The sterile smell of the white room mixing with the salt of unshed tears",
    "constraints": [],
    "beats": [],
    "target_word_count": 500,
    "justification": "This scene transitions from anticipation to sadness, building toward the climactic moment while exploring the weight of past choices"
  }
]
